oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Legendre structure of the Parisi formula
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Auffinger, Antonio
Chen, Wei-Kuo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Probability
Mathematical Physics
60K35, 82B44
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We show that the Parisi formula of the mixed $p$-spin model is a concave function of the squared inverse temperature. This allows us to derive a new expression for the Parisi formula that involves the inverse temperature and the Parisi measure as Legendre conjugate variables.
Comment: 20 pages, introduction revised, Proposition 2 added
